name: .PVMZ
summary: Learn about .PVMZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a PVMZ file with Parallels Desktop for Mac in macOS. To open a PVMZ file, place the file in the folder you set as the default location for storing virtual machines (Parallels default location is Macintosh HD/​Users/​[username]/​Documents/​Parallels/​), select File → Open in Parallels Desktop for Mac, and choose your PVMZ file.
If the virtual machine (VM) is listed as "Archived" in the Parallels Desktop for Mac Control Center, you can double-click it to unarchive it or right-click the VM and select Unarchive.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pvmz file in Parallels Desktop for Mac 26
images.caption: PVMZ file open in Parallels Desktop for Mac 26
